website_summaries.verdict: A large set that offers style, functionality, and quantity. Hands down the best for your money.
pros: Flexible silicone material available in several stylish colors
cons: Tends to attract lint and dust, but they are easy to wash

customer_reviews.title: Great for resin
customer_reviews.text: These silicone coaster worked perfectly for my resin free form pours. I make jewelry from resin and needed a small surface with a wall to stop the resin from overflowing. With a smooth surface there are no divots in the resin and the silicone makes removing the resin after it has semi cured a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: snerdlet

customer_reviews.title: The perfect coasters
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are perfect. I must say I had never really thought about what would make a good coaster but now I know. They don’t slip, they’re big enough for almost any glass, there’s a slight rim so your glass won’t slip.....as I said they’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: M Mc

customer_reviews.title: Love the
customer_reviews.text: Bought these coasters and they were as advertised. However I found a much more pressing need for this product. My queen sized bed kept on moving on the hardwood floor every time I got into or out of bed and when the light weight dog jumped on or off. I placed a coaster under each of the bed's supports and it no longer moves and the floors are protected. Love the product
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are great. They will be easy to clean. I really liked the fact they stay in place on coffee table and don’t come up with your glass when you drink. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: stacy forster

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.  You Will Not Regret!  (Black Coasters)
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order and am using a coaster right now. What can you really say about coasters? Except I NEVER expected them to be so nice! They will stay put and will not move at all. Light yet sturdy feel to them. I will recommend to family and friends. Neatly packaged and a save 10% on any BARVIVO product.
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters - too much fun to throw
customer_reviews.text: I know it's not what they're for, but these things are amazing to throw. They stick to flat surfaces perfectly, so you'll quickly find yourself making a game of out it. If these are for an office, expect no work to get done for at least the first hour of their arrival.
customer_reviews.author: A. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Functional and FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these coasters for our office to protect our conference tables. The coasters are great and protect the tables from moisture and heat. I also ordered a coaster holder from another seller. Our office is all about fun so we tried using the coasters as frisbies - they worked great! Then we created "Coaster" golf! We sail the coasters toward the coaster holder. The coasters are great for this because they don't mark up walls, glass or damage furniture. We started with one set of coasters and ordered several more after trying them and finding them both functional and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great for babies
customer_reviews.text: My infant daughter started grabbing all of our stone drink coasters. These ended up being a nice solution that she can throw all over without damaging the tables.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are such great quality and save my desk the grief of sweaty cups and stains. I shared my purchase with my friends at work. It comes with 8 coasters and I only am using 2 in my office. They all like them too. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chela Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for our table. They stick extremely well to the table. I love the rubber material. At first I thought the price was a little high but after getting the product in I can see why. They are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek/Grace

customer_reviews.title: They deserve a good review.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was like... meh... they are just coasters...why bother with a review. But they are really high quality for what I expected. They stick to the bar top pretty good, no sliding around, and they will hold a LOT of moisture without leaking over the little lip on the outer edge. Even a modest amount of beer foam overspill will be caught by these coasters. Will be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: SandFleaDDH

customer_reviews.title: You ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: Best coasters I have EVER bought!! Glasses don't stick to them and then fall to the ground. They are easily washed up and look very smart. I highly recommend them and am thinking of them as gifts for the holidays. Thanks Barvino! You rock!
customer_reviews.author: sarah biggs

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice coasters
customer_reviews.text: These are flat and nice and go with my style....LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: LuxorRio

customer_reviews.title: First class coasters ...
customer_reviews.text: Before today - I never expected to write a review about coasters but these are not your average coasters. The look and feel of these coasters makes one think you spent more on them than what you did. Great quality for a low price!
customer_reviews.author: J.E. McFarland III

customer_reviews.title: Love these coasters
customer_reviews.text: Love these coasters! They don't skid, break or tear. They keep moisture off the table and are easy to clean. This is my second set! I also found that the cat cannot "accidentally" (ha!) push them off the table. I even packed a couple in my luggage for a recent trip. They were great for setting my earrings and necklace into, so that I could find them immediately. I really do love these coasters!
customer_reviews.author: Val R

customer_reviews.title: Great Coasters
customer_reviews.text: The silicone material is great! It grips the surface it is sitting on, will be easy to wash and is not overly obvious when sitting on dark wood or surface. I also have glass coasters that fit inside them perfectly if I want to dress them up in my living room. Much better than smooth tile coasters where the condensation from a glass will just run off the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Belle

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Lightweight, sturdy, matte black and luxurious. I bring them to the bar so I can have fresh coasters instead of a flimsy cocktail napkins. Arrived quickly and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: matthew t. onorato

customer_reviews.title: Worst coasters ever
customer_reviews.text: I really don't know why some of the reviews mentioned that these were one of the best coasters that they have used, I mean I took their word for it and ordered it. It sticks with my coffee mug when I am drinking coffee, so I have to put it back on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT THE ADS SAY
customer_reviews.text: These coasters did not live up to the advertisement‘s claims - hold liquid in coaster and the glass would not stick to the coaster. The truth is, the lip on the coaster is so small the sweat ran over the side. Each time I lifted the glass the coaster came with it, spilling the liquid in the coaster. What a disaster🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kem

customer_reviews.title: Nice little coasters
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of black surfaces in my office, so I got a pack of these. They are very grippy and do the job well. I appreciated that so many came in a pack. I use these every day on my black computer desk and not an ounce of condensation hits the desk.
customer_reviews.author: C. McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great coasters. I like the fact that they can even be used for other things besides drinks. They are also a great size. I use different bottles etc and they all fit on these. Received them in a timely manner as well. And I have been contacted by the seller to make sure that I was happy with my purchase. Would buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Mast

customer_reviews.title: Designed to actually keep water from getting under the coaster!
customer_reviews.text: I have found that coasters that are supposed to absorb water, such as the condensation produced by a cold glass of water, do a very poor job of containing the water. The designers of these coasters took a different approach. They use a waterproof material with a lip to catch the small amounts of water that accumulate at the bottom of a cup. This method works quite well for me. Also these coasters are very easy to clean, and, being dark in color, are very easy to see on my light colored desk. Finally they are well made which contributes to their nice appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Regan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coasters
customer_reviews.text: We use these every day. It's great that there are 8 of them. It has enabled me to put 4 in the living room and 4 in the kitchen and dining room or have each of our guests have one when they visit. They are very easy to clean and ribbed at the edge to help prevent spillage. Also, kid friendly if you have kiddos in the household. Apparently they are a hit with ages 1-4 to stack, chew on, organize, etc. 😂 Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi h.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Rubber somehow wore into my brand new wood tables. Now in lighting my tables are stained "BARVIVO"
customer_reviews.author: ARayfield

customer_reviews.title: ... are just what I needed to keep the furniture nice and for outdoors also
customer_reviews.text: The coasters are just what I needed to keep the furniture nice and for outdoors also. The seller included instructions of how to use the product properly. You can put one on the top of the glass outside to keep insects out. I like that there are eight.
customer_reviews.author: elainejoy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sticking to the bottom of my cups
customer_reviews.text: It will stick to the bottom of your cup (due to condensation), so I have to keep pulling it off
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: They work fine as long as you dont like your drinks very cold.
customer_reviews.text: I'm the kind of guy who likes to fill the whole cup with ice, cause I like my cold drinks to be very cold. This, of course, leads to condensation outside of the cup. These coasters do not deal with condensation very well. They stick to the bottom of your cup and then when you go for a drink you lift up the cup and the coaster together. Then of course, the pool of condensed water goes all over the table, completely defeating the purpose of having a coaster in the first place. So, if you like your drinks icy, these are not the coasters for you. If you're a normal human being, they'll work fine.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: BESTS EVER!
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are awesome! Condensation from glasses does not soak through to the table. They glasses are more stable - little to no chance of slipping from the coaster. They survive frisbee duels without damage to furniture or contestants. I plan to order more so each sitting area in our home has enough for all drinks in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Dragon

customer_reviews.title: Not the best item !!
customer_reviews.text: Not really good item, I was expecting to have these coasters more steady and not that soft....... hm, for these money I would not buy them again and do not recommend to others!!! Have decided to leave them already just because I have received an email from the seller whom seams nice and helpful! Good luck to them!
customer_reviews.author: Vella86

customer_reviews.title: Nice coaster, great if you have little ones
customer_reviews.text: It's a coaster, it does what it's supposed to. The silicon is nice and we use them inside and outside on the patio table. They hold up to my 2 year old "playing" with them, easy to clean. We don't have to worry about the baby hurting himself or the furniture with these vice the old ceramic or stone ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rayner

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Well made and look just as pictured. I’m just disappointed that the cups will stick to the coaster when you lift it off the table. Sometimes you don’t realize the coaster is there until the condensation spills on you when you take a sip.
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Rubber circles
customer_reviews.text: Ok so they get the job done but def not the best . They’re just circle rubber pieces with ridges one them. So they def feel flimsy. I thought they wouldn’t be flexible but they’re extremely. Also note there’s so coaster holder.
customer_reviews.author: M Tran

customer_reviews.title: I dislike these coasters so much
customer_reviews.text: I dislike these coasters so much. I've had them for 6 months and I am about to go "office space" on them. They collect so much condensation that they suction to the glass then fall off and I am left wiping up the collected condensation on my table. How are these working for other people? Are they only drinking warm or room temperature liquids. I like drinks with ice in them. Total fail.
customer_reviews.author: Failed ninja

customer_reviews.title: Coasters fine. Seller emails excessive and annoying.
customer_reviews.text: The coasters seem fine. The number of emails from the seller are excessive and irritating.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: The exact opposite of what you probably want...
customer_reviews.text: These are legitimately awful for a number of reasons as a result of their material: rubber. A coaster SHOULD catch condensation and subsequently ABSORB it to dry after the cup is gone. THESE coasters don't absorb anything; they only catch the condensation and allow it to puddle up. So, unless you want a puddle of water inevitably dripping onto your table, I highly recommend you look elsewhere. I would only recommend these possibly for hot drinks or just for decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Clings easy to ice cold glasses
customer_reviews.text: The only thing we do not like about these are they cling to a glass that has ice in it, and they leave very visible water rings. My tables are safe, but I constantly pick up a glass and the coaster is stuck to its bottom!
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coasters
customer_reviews.text: Functional, tasteful, well designed to stay put and be lightweight and seamless. Very happy with this purchase. Getting a lot of use out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Shells

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Non slip, non marring, waterproof, easy to clean, flexible and durable. The only coaster you will ever need. Great product, great company, great service.
customer_reviews.author: John Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Yup buy them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They don’t slide around On counters, protect surface from drink sweats and best part is they are soft so if toddler gets them won’t break like stone/ceramic ones we have!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: It could be perfect
customer_reviews.text: sometimes it sticks to the cup which can be annoying. and also leaves white dots that will stay forever on that. but other than that it is durable and won't move
customer_reviews.author: Parelem

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. It is sleek. I love the rim. It holds water really well. I didn’t realize it was like silicone when I bought it. Lots of people love silicone, but if you wipe it with a paper towel it puts fuzzies on it. I am sure if you just rinse it off it would be fine. I still like it.
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: These things are super nice and they grip to the surface of a wood table well. They are slightly larger than normal base so it allows for larger glasses to sit on them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Rubber
customer_reviews.text: What is the point of these? They seem to work for hot coffee, but when used with cold drinks they COLLECT water profusely which then drips everywhere. Be sure to keep a towel next to it or better yet use the towel instead of it. YUK. Maybe better than nothing...or maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Baysinger

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Does not absorbed BUT contains condisation to keep moisture damage from surfaces. Very compact.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Andre

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like that these coasters do not slide around on the table surface. They work well and seem to be durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Coasters
customer_reviews.text: I used them for the first time this past week, and found them to be very good in protecting my dining room table from fluids. They also don't scratch surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: bikerdot

customer_reviews.title: Simple and durable. Wish they were a tad larger.
customer_reviews.text: These are simple and unobtrusive, and seem pretty durable. I just wish they were about 1/2" larger in diameter, as some coffee mugs won't fit inside the lip.
customer_reviews.author: David Phillips

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted matte black coasters for drinks when I'm at my matte black themed desk and these are perfect. Cheap and high quality and seemingly very durable
customer_reviews.author: Logz

customer_reviews.title: Sticks
customer_reviews.text: Every drink I've tried from glasses to cans has the coaster sticking to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ptilly

customer_reviews.title: Multi-purpose product
customer_reviews.text: Hilariously my only complaint is that I have too many coasters now...I wanted something rubber so it would stay put. These work great. Ended up taking 4 I never use and put them under the feet on my Home Theater Subwoofer to keep the floor from rattling. Dampens well! Multi-purpose product!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: These stick to the bottom of your glass all the ...
customer_reviews.text: These stick to the bottom of your glass all the time so you are constantly having to remove them from your glass or cup when you pick it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that it would always cling to the bottom of my drinks. The coasters would stick to the drinks and would end up n the floor if I wasn’t paying attention eat time I grabbed my drink.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters
customer_reviews.text: This coasters stay in place. They are easy to clean. I use Tervis glasses and they don't usually create much moisture but the coasters are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: I like them, but they don't work for me to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like them, but they don't work for me to put ice water by my bed at night. The condensation puddles on the coaster, but soaks through to the wood table below. If you are using them for standard drinks for a few hours, they work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Coasters
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a nice box if you wanted to gift the coasters. Just a great product and has multiple uses, other then a coaster.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use easy to clean and they protect my furniture. Very happy with my.purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sharon cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what they are advertised to be. They are large coasters. I am using them for my patio table. I love that they don't slide around and stay in place. You can sit a beer mug on these just fine. They are just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: My favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: Only dislike, is these stick to bottom of whatever cup am using. So when pick up have to make sure not picking up holder with it. But these are easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: They sweated & still left white rings on furniture. Not good
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice and simple Doesn’t slide easy to clean Blends with furniture
customer_reviews.author: Brenda McBroom

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Arrived on time as described
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Arrived on time as described. I like the ribs on the edge which prevent condensation from getting on my hardwood coffee table, and the silicone acts as an insulator helping to prevent condensation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Coasters
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are durable and can fit decently large cups. They do not slide around surfaces which is nice because it prevents spills. They are also very neutral looking and would go great with most decorative styles.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Allegrezza

customer_reviews.title: Protective Drink Coasters
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these drink coasters for our new dining room table. We love them. What made it especially nice for us was that they are from a company based in Denmark. Denmark has a special place in our hearts since my husband is from there.
customer_reviews.author: S. Mikkelsen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Needed some simple coasters for my black and white room but didn’t want to spend an arm & a leg for them. Just received these & I’m impressed with the quality. It came with 8 & they’re simple, yet aesthetically cute.
customer_reviews.author: elexiss robles

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Price is right and I like the fact that they are black. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ana R

customer_reviews.title: Great drink coasters
customer_reviews.text: Love these coasters. Beverages don’t slip off and they are nice to have sitting around the room.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: I don't ask for much in a coaster, just that they contain my drink without getting the countertop wet, and these coasters do that. They've got a good grip to them so they won't go sliding if you bump your drink. What more could you need?
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Pride

customer_reviews.title: Awesome drink coasters
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are awesome. The best I've ever purchased. They look great on our end tables, and are dishwasher safe. We've been using them since we got them, and I couldn't be happier. There will be no liquid on your tabletops, and they won't fall apart. I'm guessing they will outlast me. Love them...
customer_reviews.author: Jan E.

customer_reviews.title: Great product. No mess. No fuss.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and keep tabletops clean. Ive also used it to open jars and handles that require more grip. Very useful and minimal-look when left out for use.
customer_reviews.author: iamgrace

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: They are great coasters. The reason for the low rating on the absorbency is that they are rubber and do not absorb. They are exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: cliffsmethurst

customer_reviews.title: I have not had these long enough to give it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had these long enough to give it a five star but they do not scratch wood surfaces. I do not know if they sweat moisture but it appears from what little use I have had with these that they do not. I have only set hot coffee mugs on them.
customer_reviews.author: POIKILOTHERM

customer_reviews.title: Flexible, gripping coasters.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works well. The material is as advertised, a flexible silicone. The one thing that surprised me is how much they grip. This can be either good or bad, depending on where one uses them. I use them on a dining room table top and a coffee table. Gripping is a plus on the coffee table, where the surface can be unstable, but a minus on the dining room table, where the surface is already stable. The material also attracts those dust specks, but this is mostly evident on the bottom, which has the grip. I bought them because I wanted flexible coasters, yet ones that held their shape.
customer_reviews.author: BAR

customer_reviews.title: First choice
customer_reviews.text: Sleek, simple, versatile for size of glass or cup, do NOT slip, easy to keep clean ...as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Bodi

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and smooth
customer_reviews.text: It’s sleek and smart. It has a slick surface that helps it to stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Zimbly

customer_reviews.title: Great Coasters with multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are great. Super easy to clean and have actually helped me open a stubborn jar as advertised. The only bad thing I can say about them is they seem to collect my cats hair so I’m washing them more often.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiB

customer_reviews.title: Child safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought because i have a lot of little ones at my house over the holidays and they love to play with coasters. These wont damage anything if dropped or thrown.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: They do have a lip to keep liquids from ruining furniture. Easy to clean and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Lesha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little drink companion
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it's the simple pleasures..... like a nice coaster! These grippy little buggers don't slide around, they're easy to clean, flat and round coasters with a little lip to contain any condensation. They fit an 88mm cup base. I don't know what more you can expect from a coaster!
customer_reviews.author: Randelbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homes and gifts
customer_reviews.text: I have a set at my place and I always buy one for any gift exchanges! Its always a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Aboubakare

customer_reviews.title: great coasters
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are just what we needed. They keep your drink stable and won't leak or wet through.
customer_reviews.author: Caswell

customer_reviews.title: They stick to the bottom
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these because they were hoping they would not stick to the bottom of all of our glasses like our last set. These are actually worse. You sometimes have to peel them off the bottom of your glass. They do seem durable. But irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Kristenkyoung033

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: After looking for a set of coasters for my home, I finally decided upon the "#1 Best Drink Coasters by Barvivo" and could not be happier. They hold any excess moisture that may bead or spill out or over the side, they're functional, and most importantly stylish without being brash
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Lantz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: love them I ordered more. They don't slip and have a nice lip to catch moisture from the glass
customer_reviews.author: K. Falzter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just got these and love them! I love the material and they stay put on my table
customer_reviews.author: TERRI

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place
customer_reviews.text: Bought new polywood patio furniture and needed coasters to keep our glassware from sliding on the arms.
customer_reviews.author: ish johnson

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and Non-slip
customer_reviews.text: Great coaster as they do not slip and are waterproof. The rim could be a little higher to contain the condensation from ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, Coaster or for bottom of couch legs lol
customer_reviews.author: Cindee

customer_reviews.title: These coasters are great!
customer_reviews.text: These coasters are great! I was worried that they would have that terrible rubber smell, and they don't smell at all. I wanted something simple and modern in looks plus unbreakable, and these are perfect. And you can use them indoors or outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Clean, Sleek, and Hold Up Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been having these for months and they work great. They are clean and sleek and look great on a coffee table. It doesn’t have any rack which is the only downside but other than that they have been holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The coasters look nice and don't slip
customer_reviews.text: The coasters look nice and don't slip, however condensation that formed on my cold glass soaked through the coaster and onto the table underneath. It seems that these are not waterproof and will not protect wood or other water sensitive surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: duck

customer_reviews.title: Great coasters! Go perfectly on my black side table
customer_reviews.text: Great coasters! Go perfectly on my black side table. Love the rim around the edge which can catch drips. Would strongly recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ann Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These coasters look great in any setting. They stack easily and are the first set I've ever thought were stylish enough to just leave out on the coffee table. They are very thin and flexible but have a small rim to catch condensation.
customer_reviews.author: T. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Washable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Description was exactly what I received. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Brisker

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: The soft material makes setting down your drink quiet. The raised lip keeps the table dry and the weight keeps them from flying away whenever a breeze blows by. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Docken

customer_reviews.title: Okay but they leak everywhere! I got them to ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay but they leak everywhere! I got them to use with my bottles of water and when they get condensation on them and sweat, the coasters must have a paper towels under them or water goes all over everything on the coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Anitra

customer_reviews.title: Does. Not. Slip.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. They do not slide on any surface I put them on, and they're wide enough to hold anything I want to put down. Silicone wipes easily. I'm going to buy another set.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jordan Carroll

customer_reviews.title: These are well designed - great coasters. I bought them as a gift but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are well designed - great coasters. I bought them as a gift but once I opened the box my husband grabbed one for his desk. Keeping these and will be ordering another box.
customer_reviews.author: DJJ

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Coasters
customer_reviews.text: I like these coasters that easily stay in place on tables and can be washed in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: mcf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These work great and are durable and non-slip. Would definitely purchase these silicone coasters again.
customer_reviews.author: jenny careaga

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product for its use. Made of rubber, it is a perfect coaster for the those unfinished wood surfaces, for which it was bought (bedroom night stand). I am glad I found this!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher D Collins

product_meta.title: Barvivo Drink Coasters Set of 8 - Tabletop Protection for Any Table Type, Wood, Granite, Glass, Soapstone, Sandstone, Marble, Stone Tables - Perfect Soft Coaster Fits Any Size of Drinking Glasses.
feature_bullets: STOP WORRYING ABOUT SPILLS AND STAINS ON YOUR TABLES OR HOME BAR - Don't let another precious moment slip by because of worries, with these black silicone coasters you will be able to relax and enjoy all the funny moments with your friends and family knowing all your countertops and furniture both indoor and outdoor will be safe from permanent damage.

THE UNIQUE AND EXQUISITE BARVIVO PACKAGING MAKES THIS PIECE THE PERFECT GIFT - Imagine walking into your very best friends' birthday party and handing her this stunning decorative gift box. It will be a great ice breaker for people and make an excellent topic of conversation at the party. But what's even better is that your gift will become a large part of her daily life and help her avoid long lasting stains in a elegant way.

DON’T BUY ANY COASTER SET ONLINE OR IN A STORE BEFORE READING THIS--> Other coasters made of cork, paper, cardboard, rubber, ceramic, slate tile, agate and rug doesn't have the same table grip and high slip resistance as our premium quality coasters, and they can potentially damage your tables. Don't compare on price, you get what you pay for. We have had high-end hotels, bars and restaurants saying they love and endorse our coasters and use them as a natural part of their accessories.

WHY ONLY USE THEM AS COASTERS WHEN YOU CAN USE THEM FOR SO MUCH MORE - These flexible and water resistant coasters can be used for much more than just saving table tops, alternatively they can be used to protect your drinks from insects when you are outdoors, as a trivet for hot pans replacing the traditional wooden trivets or even as a jar opener. There are so many fun alternative ways to use these modern coasters - what's your alternative use?

THE IDEAL COASTER SET FOR THE PERSON WHO WANTS MORE TIME TO RELAX AND ENJOY LIFE - This BARVIVO coaster set is the perfect match for any daily life, they have extremely low maintenance since they are dishwasher safe - You can use them on your dining table, coffee table or even for your favorite cup at the office. Then after you have used them, all you have to do is to throw them into the dishwasher and let it do it’s thing, that’s how simple it is - So Don’t Worry, Be Happy!
